Welcome to the latest edition of the Haxe Roundup. Haxe is a high level, strictly typed programming language and cross-compiler.

Updates from the Haxe core

Current Proposals

  • Add Type Matching.
  • Add Macro method forwarding.
  • Add Generator Expressions.
  • Support Inline XML.
  • Add Union Types.
  • Add Arrow functions.
  • Add the Spread operator.
  • Do you have an idea to improve Haxe? Consider creating a proposal.

Core Changes

21 commits have been made to Haxe compiler in the last week.

  • Inline constructors rework - pull request.
  • Optimize search for descendants in DCE resulting in ~60% faster compilation - pull request.

You can get started using the latest features by downloading a nightly build of Haxe.

Take it easy everyone and have a good week!
